column1: Do you often feel restless? (e.g., being nervous, having difficulty sitting still, fidgeting, doing a lot of exercise, or being active)
Do you often act first and then think? (e.g., blurting things out, spending too much money, or being impatient)
Do you often have concentration problems? (e.g., being easily distracted, not finishing things, being easily bored, forgetful, or chaotic)
